snippet: The move by the regional government of Castile and León comes amid tensions over the annual festival in Tordesillas and other events that animal rights activists say involves cruelty.
lead_paragraph: The move by the regional government of Castile and León comes amid tensions over the annual festival in Tordesillas and other events that animal rights activists say involves cruelty.

headline.main: Killing of Bulls Is Banned at Toro de la Vega Festival in Spain
